PSCT.Vegas:
2 Level 4 monsters
① Can't attack. 
② Once per turn: You can detach 1 Material from this card; roll a six-sided die and apply the result.
● 1: Halve your LP.
● 2: Draw 1 card.
● 3: Your opponent discards 1 card.
● 4: Negate the effects of 1 face-up card on the field until the end of the turn.
● 5: Destroy 1 card on the field.
● 6: Destroy this card.
